Sudoku is a game whose goal is to assign a number between 1 and 9 to each one of the 81 cells of a given board. Said cells are distributed in a grid of 9 rows and 9 columns.\n\nThe game finishes when a number has been assigned to every cell but satisfying the following conditions:
Each number must not be repeated in the corresponding row of the assigned cell
Each number must not be repeated in the corresponding column of the assigned cell
The board of 81 cells is dived into 9 quadrants of 9 cells (3 rows and 3 columns each one). The number must not be repeated in the corresponding quadrant of the assigned cell
Initially there are some preassigned cells. The most preassigned cells, the easier it will be.
